alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:11PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Madison and central Beaverhead Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 410 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles northeast of Lima, or 27 miles southeast of Dillon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail, and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Roads will likely be slick, possibly with some ponding of water. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Madison and central Beaverhead Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
